hudson.tasks.Shell.command: #!/bin/bash -l month=`date -d "-1 day" +%m` day=`date -d "-1 day" +%d` spark-submit --class com.om.opensourway.AnalysisForBatch --num-executors 2 --executor-cores 6 --master yarn /home/xia/om-bigdata-1.0-SNAPSHOT-jar-with-dependencies.jar GJK7VGQW4KI5MBSMOE2Q Dim9rM3uivK1gFv7gBGT80G7oLWpOt2JTPTjBFeY 100 obs://mirrorlog/mirrors.log-2022$month$day openeuler mirrorofopeneuler mirror-$month-$day com.om.Module.openeuler.morrirs_Openeuler_Recoeds
